artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Yamana Tomesaburō; Author: Masukawa Kan'yū; Publisher: Fukyūsha; Carver: Horikoshi Kan'ichi
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: light blue cover; two color images at beginning, one featuring three men seated on the ground with lacquer trays and red bowls, a kneeling woman at L reaches for kettle; second image of young boys standing in a clearing in the woods looking at the moon; remaining pages of text with black and white images, some hand coloring in red
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education (Nishiki-e shūshindan 錦絵修身談)
title: Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education, vol. 4
